user.description: You need to supply the 'main' API key from UptimeRobot

reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: You need to supply a new 'main' API key from UptimeRobot

error.not_main_key: Wrong API key type detected, use the 'main' API key
error.reauth_failed_matching_account: The API key you provided does not match the account ID for existing configuration.

abort.reauth_failed_existing: Could not update the config entry, please remove the integration and set it up again.
